Package de.oth.blocklib.ai.statemachine.states.quest

Class BuildHouseState

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.ai.statemachine.states.AbstractState<Npc>
de.oth.blocklib.ai.statemachine.states.quest.QuestState
de.oth.blocklib.ai.statemachine.states.quest.BuildHouseState
public class BuildHouseState
extends QuestState
Class where the NPC orders all the tasks for building a house and once all the tasks has been done he start building a house.
Author:
Christoph Weidner
